QuoteRecipientGroupMember.name: QuoteRecipientGroupMember
QuoteRecipientGroupMember.description: Represents a junction between a quote line item recipient and a quote recipient group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the quote recipient group member.

OwnerId.description: The ID of a quote recipient group member.

QuoteLineItemRecipientId.description: The quote line item recipient associated with the quote recipient group.

QuoteRecipientGroupId.description: The quote line item recipient group associated with the quote recipient group.
